desc: We need a modelling and texturing artist for the following tasks (listed in order of importance):1. Anatomy of the Body: We already have the full 3D male model ready with us. There are just 8 muscles that are missing:- Vocal Folds (Model is ready but needs editing of True Vocal Folds and False Vocal Folds)- Tongue- 2 Neck Muscles (Genioglossus and Hyoglossus)- 2 Pelvic Muscles (Levator ani and Coccyges)- 3 Back Muscles: Splenius Capitis, Longissimus and Iliocostalis musclesWe have all the references for each of these parts (Images and Videos). Please refer to the uploaded files for some samples of the current model and the changes required.2. Facial Mask: We have a basic design of the facial mask but we need a proper model for it.3. Body Jacket: We have rough sketches for the body jacket but we need a proper model for it.4. Pot Designs: We have basic designs but we need proper models for it.We would need the Anatomy Project completed as soon as possible as the model needs to go for rigging. Any changes to the parts modelled and textured would come under the fixed amount agreed upon.We are working with Autodesk Maya 2015 for the animation project.
title: 3D Anatomy of the Body, Facial Mask and Body Jacket

desc: I am in need of what will be a prototype of a 3D-printed hollow ball.It is two pieces, separable by a simple twist, like a twist off top.1) the bottom half to be smooth with no holes2) top half is an easy to twist off top with small holes which are placed around the tops entire circumference.  These holes are sized about the circumference of a pencil eraser. The center-top of the top needs an attached loop so a string can be put through it so it can be hung.  Size of the overall object needs to be between a golf ball and tennis ball.After the first prototype, we may order a second with revisions or, if it works as planned, a bulk order of 30-50 or more for market testing, at which time I'll request a fixed-price project quote.
